values.name: Liquid Air Energy Network

values: Liquid Air as an energy vector

values.description:
Liquid air is a proven energy storage technology that could play a critical role in Britain’s low carbon energy future, according to a major new report from business and academic experts. The use of liquid air for grid-based energy storage could increase UK energy security, cut greenhouse gas emissions and create a new industry worth at least £1bn pa and 22,000 jobs to the UK, the report found.

The report, published by the Centre for Low Carbon Futures (CLCF) and launched at a joint conference with the Royal Academy of Engineering, concludes that liquid air technologies could also significantly increase the efficiency of road vehicles, particularly in Britain’s fleets of buses, vans and refrigerated lorries.

The Liquid Air Energy Network (LAEN) is the new forum for the advocacy and development of liquid air as an alternative way to harness waste and surplus energy within power and transport. As a nascent industry, connecting disparate interested parties within the emerging sector will play a key role in accelerating its development.

Contributors to the report include Arup, Ricardo, National Grid, Poyry, Messer Group; and academics from the Universities of Leeds, Birmingham, Strathclyde, Brighton, Queen Mary University of London and Imperial College.

To learn more about LAEN, including how to become a member, liquid air as an energy vector or to download the report please visit www.liquidair.org.uk 

Founding Director: Toby Peters
Email: info@liquidair.org.uk

values.name: The White Swan, Arundel
values.description:
The White Swan is a traditional and charming pub located in the South Downs of Sussex. We have a welcoming and friendly pub and bar, 20 lovely bedrooms and special rooms for weddings, celebrations, meetings and informal conferences.

We are in easy reach of Brighton, Portsmouth and Gatwick and Arundel, with its imposing Norman castle, is on our doorstep. We’re perfectly placed for walking on the Downs or lazing on the nearby beaches.

Our friendly and helpful team will look after you during your stay with us whether you’re dropping in for a quick bite to eat, spending a few days holidaying in the area or passing through on a business trip.

values.name: NB Fitness Club, LLC
values.description:
First in fitness for those who seek a state-of-the art workout experience with first-class amenities, NB Fitness Club features the finest equipment, facilities and programs Brighton and Allston have to offer.  

Test your fitness limits in our spacious workout areas.

- NB Fitness Club offers state-of-the-art cardiovascular equipment with built-in TV's and Ipod docks. 
- Free-weight and functional training zones
- An array of selectorized equipment for total body workouts

Whether you prefer yoga, pilates, studio cycle, cardio or strength training, we offer energizing group fitness classes to fit your needs and schedule.

Even after a hard workout, there's always room to enjoy NB Fitness Club's comforts and amenities.
- The Spa is open to the public and features sports and deep tissue massages.
- Complimentary towel service is available in the locker rooms and workout areas.
- Relax in our well-appointed locker room and dry saunas.
- Enjoy complimentary garage parking and Wi-Fi service throughout the club.

All new members receive a one-on-one personal training evaluation and a private Pilates Session with one of our certified trainers.

Expert Procurement Limited
values.description:
Expert Procurement Limited is a business focussing on implementing robust procurement strategies to deliver real value and true savings across multiple vertical markets. These include Healthcare, Manufacturing, FMCG & Retail.  Its principle aim is to instill professionalism and commerciality to any organisation and transform the performance of the Procurement function.  To this end, Expert Procurement has extensive experience in building best in class teams and motivating them to exceed expectation and targets to deliver true cash-releasing bottom line savings.  Since the company’s incorporation, the following assignments have been successfully completed:

MAY ’13 – DEC ‘13:	INTERIM DIRECTOR OF PROCUREMENT, HAMPSHIRE HOSPITALS NHS TRUST

Reporting to the Chief Financial Officer (CFO), the main achievements included:

•	Obtaining Board level approval to restructure & increase the size of the team 
•	Managing a successful restructure of the existing team (18 people) as well as leading the recruitment of the permanent Associate Director of Procurement (start date November 2013)
•	Developing a short & medium Procurement strategy for the Trust & obtaining sign off at Board level
•	Increasing the profile of Procurement with Senior members of the Trust
•	Developing the outline sourcing plan for FY14/15 across £80m of spend

FEB ’13 - MAY ’13:	INTERIM HEAD OF PROCUREMENT, BRIGHTON & SUSSEX UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL

Reporting to the Chief Financial Officer (CFO), the main achievements included:

•	Developing the sourcing plan for FY13/14 across c£120m spend & obtaining sign off at Board level
•	Preparing a quick win sourcing strategy targeting savings from the top 20 suppliers which delivered in excess of 8%
•	Completing an interim restructure of the existing team (30 people) to focus resource to deliver the best results
•	Work with senior management to increase the profile of Procurement within the organisation

Wedding Party DJs
values.description:
We rock wedding parties.

Me and Gaz have been involved with music for years, and have DJ’d together since we met in 2007.  Initially we did the Brighton club circuit and released a few underground songs as producers, but we quickly discovered that we also shared a passion for playing parties for people of all ages.

At a an important party two DJs can be beneficial as it guarantees someone is always on hand,  and we can set-up all the equipment quicker saving you any additional fuss.  We do not charge any extra so our prices are not effected. With the two us there is back-up, and you get the benefit of both of our music collections. In addition if requested or appropriate we can interact with your guests and take requests while the other DJ keeps the party going.

values.name: Audio T
values.description:
Audio T is one of the oldest and most respected hi-fi retailers in the world having been in business for over 45 years! 

Started in London in 1966 the company has always been innovative - selling the best from large and small companies alike. Our reputation for offering the best products combined with the best service and advice keeps our customers returning time and time again.

In September 2008 we merged with like-minded companies, Audio Excellence and Practical Hi-Fi. 

We have 15 physical stores (Brentwood, Brighton, Bristol, Cardiff, Cheltenham, Enfield, Manchester, Oxford, Portsmouth, Preston, Reading, Southampton, Swansea, Swindon, Tunbridge Wells) and with our online store we are able to offer our goods and services to customers throughout he United Kingdom.  

In July 2010 we announced plans to join forces with Sevenoaks Sound & Vision but this ultimately did not work well for us and we rebranded all our stores as Audio T again.

We offer premium hi-fi products: loudspeakers, amplifiers, turntables, streamers, CD players, Racks/Stands portable hi-fi, headphones and much more...from leading manufacturers from around the world, many of whom are British companies that offer class leading products in their own right.

We are all enthusiasts who love music and film and are passionate about sound quality!

Love music and film, love Audio T!

Andrew W Rae
values.description:
I am Andrew W Rae and I love all things audio.

I specialise in Music Composition, Audio Production & Sound Design for all types of creative audio visual projects. 

My services include, but are by no means limited to, the followings applications:

- Film
- TV
- Web
- Video Games
- Events

I have well-grounded experience in traditional, modern and innovative domains so whatever your audio needs are, I am 100% sure that I can deliver that all important final touch that your project deserves regardless of your location, budget or timeframe. My main priority is always to produce uncompromising top quality audio to the absolute best of my ability that not only compliments your work but that you and others will love.
A little more about me:

I have been fortunate enough to work with some amazingly talented and reputable clients from across the globe including UEFA, Saatchi & Saatchi, AMV BBDO, Ithaca Audio, Anna Ginsburg, Epic Cinema, Brighton Dome, Lack of Afro & Happy Finish. This has allowed me to work on projects which have gained an overwhelmingly positive response including well over 1,000,000 views online, a nomination for a 2013 Webby Awards, an honourable mention at the 2012 Taipei International Digital Content Awards and features by CBS, The Atlantic, Gizmodo, Music Radar, NME, Daily Motion, Vimeo and hundreds more websites and blogs.

To get a quote, or to simply have a chat, please do not hesitate to get in touch.

Since 1993, Lighthouse Wealth Management has been helping successful people and businesses bring the pieces together. With our team of fully qualified advisors, and a strong Administrative support team, we are there to support you along the way. Through our wealth of hands-on financial experience, we bring the very best options to your home or business. 

Lighthouse Wealth Management is a holistic financial management group that consists of four managing partners who are full time financial planners carrying various designations. As a firm we deal with a wide range of clients and specific client needs, with specialists in wealth accumulation, protection, and transition.

We are well connected to other ethical and experienced professionals which we draw on as needed to meet our client's needs including Chartered Accountants, Estate Lawyers, Mortgage Borkers, Real Estate Agents and more, however we frequently work alongside our clients' existing professional advisory team, assisting them in the optimization of the wealth management strategy.  

The Brighton branch of the organization was established by David Sharp CFP, EPC in 1993. From there it has grown to include two additional branches - one in Peterborough and one in Smiths Falls.

The Peterborough branch of the organization was established by James Hughes BBA, CFP, CLU and Matthew Aston CFP, CLU, in 2006, with the purchase and opening of the office on Aylmer Street in 2010.

The Smiths Falls branch of the organization was established by David Sharp CFP, EPC and Shaun Johnston in 2009.
values.name: Lighthouse Wealth Management Ltd
EYEdeal trading
values.description:
Online glasses shop, offering high quality low cost prescription spectacles, and accessories, with a repair service and mobile consultation.

Started in 1999 as a high quality, low cost, alternative to the independent and multiple opticians, EYEdeal opened it's retail studio in Camden Road, Tunbridge Wells. Here we offered an exclusive range of EYEdeal designed frames and a bespoke handmade frame service, coupled with an unprecedented customer experience. Our mission was to supply the best quality product and top notch service at a fair price. We moved our studio to Brighton in 2007 where we continued our unique service. We decided to close our retail studio in 2008 and now focus on the internet experience, where we can keep overheads low. We still offer an exclusive range of glasses only available on our website. Known as the "Gem" range these frames were designed by us and manufactured for us, exclusively. We also offer a repair service and a mobile consultation service. Our mission is, still, to provide a quality product for a fair price with exceptional service.

values.name: Big Man Films Ltd
values.description:
Based in the heart of Brighton's bustling filmmaking community, Big Man Films is working with award-winning writers and directors to produce high quality, cutting edge film and television projects across a variety of genres including drama, romance, comedy, horror and thriller.
"At Big Man Films, story is at the heart of everything we do. We're passionate about original ideas and work with talented writers to help them develop their scripts into great film and television projects. We currently have a diverse slate of productions at various stages of development – from horror and action adventure to TV comedy and epic fantasy series. We're not obsessed with any one genre – we're just obsessed with great storytelling."
